participant_1.background:
I remember making up stories with my friends and playing outside until the sun went down.
i love 80s music.
i write fiction for fun.
I spent my birthday riding my boat and listening to folk metal.
i m really excited to see how game of thrones ends.

participant_2.background:
I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday.
i don t eat meat.
i take my emotions out through art.
I love being able to use my music to help children in need.
i am argentinian.

content.text: Very well, thanks! How are you doing?
I'm doing well, thank you! What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love writing fiction, and I also enjoy playing video games.
Me too! I love writing fiction and playing video games. What kind of fiction do you like to write?
I like to write sci-fi and fantasy stories.
That's awesome! I love sci-fi and fantasy too. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.
That's a great book! I love the humor in it. Do you play any video games?
Yes, I love playing video games. Some of my favorite games are The Legend of Zelda, Super Mario Bros., and Final Fantasy.
Me too! I love all of those games! I also love playing Skyrim.
Skyrim is a great game! I love the open-world aspect of it.
Me too! It's so much fun to explore and discover new things.
It sure is! I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who enjoys the same things I do.
I agree! We should play some video games together sometime.
That would be fun! I'll send you my friend code.
